reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major substance abuse categories: alcohol use disorder (~100-150 per 100k), opioid use disorder (~50-100 per 100k), stimulant/cocaine use (~30-50 per 100k), cannabis/other drug use (~50-100 per 100k) = ~250-400 per 100k annual incidence. Low confidence due to heterogeneity, definitional variations across regions, and significant underreporting.
